data: Hey there you must be that new kid
Name's Mack but for now there's a higher chance of me winning poker than meeting you in person
and I sure do miss my wife after the divorce...
Anyways! that's not important right now but that's why were on the phone
So lets get started
You got the brand new toy I sent you?
yeah well it isnt brand or new either
Unfortunately you were one of the unlucky ones
What you're holding there is the inventory garbage
Its a piece of work, it cant scan continuously cuz the darn thing keeps overheating unlike the brand new models
so why don't we start with something simple and do a scan of the training warehouse, press (LEFT CLICK) to shoot a small burst
YEAH like that, oh wow I thought it would have exploded in your hands by now
Now try to leave the room and keep scanning, get every crook and cranny
also careful while walking around, its very dark, we don't want you banging your head over and over
we don't offer insurance to "Freelancers"
Looks like you're doing well
by the way, there are some valuable in that room, try to "repossess" those
anything valuable in a foreclosed house belongs to the bank
and the bank just uses them as tax write off, so its fair game for us
oh yeah the boss also will take a cut from the valuables you ste-a. i mean repossess
looks like you're ready, make sure you scan every inch in the warehouse
take the door over there to finish your training
